A Family History

of the Landgren and Collins Families

Collins
Family Tree Lineage Index
Robert Collins

Robert Collins was born in Milton, Wisconsin on the 6th of September, 1885 (5, 8, 10, 11). By 1900, the family had moved to Edgerton, Wisconsin 9 miles away (1). On the 27th of October, 1906, Robert married his first wife, Viola Manley, in Winnebago County, Illinois (3). By 1910 Robert and Viola have likely divorced as he is living with his parents who had moved to Rockford, Illinois as listed in the 1910 Census (2). On the 21st of March, 1914 he married May Allen in Lake County, Indiana, just across the Illinois/Indiana Border up by Chicago (4). In 1917, he is drafted in World War I. His draft card records the couple as living at 1006 Kelburn in Rockford, and Robert’s occupation as a stove mounter at the Eclipse Stove Comapny (5, 7). Around that time they have their first child, Roberta Collins (6).

By 1920, they are living at 714 Chestnut in Rockford and Robert is still working at the same job (6, 7). By 1924, they have moved to 1019 Peach, Rockford (7). A gap in records I have been able to find so far exists, but by 1935 he has married Minnie M. Brown from Missouri, and now lives at 1116 2nd Avenue. They live at this address for at least a decade (7). In 1942, he is registered in World War II in the Fourth Registration, also called the “Old Man’s Draft,” because it registered men who were 45 to 64 years old (from Fold3.com). His card records his employer as Mansfried Carlin at 306 7th St., Rockford. His hair has since gone gray according to the card (10).

In October 1976 Robert Collins dies in Rockford, Illinois. The only record I can find for his death is his Social Security Death Index entry (11) which gives his date of death only as specific as the month.

Imaged from Family History Library microfilm. Registration State: Illinois; Registration County: Winnebago; Roll: 1614545; Draft Board: 1

Born: September 6, 1885 (5, 8, 10, 11)

Birthplace: Milton, Rock County, Wisconsin (5, 8, 10, 11)

Mother: Paulina Juhnke (1, 2, 3)

Father: Frank Collins (1, 2, 3)

Wife: May Allen (4, 5, 6, 7)

Married: March 21, 1914 (4)

Marriage Place: Lake County, Indiana (4)

Direct Descendant: Roberta Collins (8)

Death: October 1978 (11)

Death Place: Rockford, Winnebago, Illinois (11)

Burial Place: unknown (?)
